name: CH3SS
description:
CH3SS

[Working progress]

A basic 3-dimensional chess game in development. 

ControlsCamera movement - WASD
Piece movement - Left click and drag
Attack board movement - Left click and drag
Attack board rotation - right click during movement Taking a piece is basic and requires moving the taken piece to the side board areas.
3-Dimensional Chess Rules

I highly recommend rules curated by Jens Meder & friends.

http://meder.spacechess.org/3dschach/chess3d.htm

Feedback

Suggestions appreciated! Also open to any potential involvement in the project.

Bugs

- Piece placement needs optimising and it is recommended to use the camera angle to make it easier.

- Overlapping pieces.
